text: not sure if anyone's checked this out... $59 per sensor and huge, so not made to scale at all, but has a similar function: <http://www.parrot.com/usa/products/flower-power/>

attachments.title: Parrot - Flower Power - intelligent wireless sensor for your plants
attachments.text: Parrot - Flower Power, Parrot brings the Internet of Things to the garden. Parrot Flower Power, the first intelligent wireless sensor
